009package imagingbook.common.color.sets;
010
011import java.awt.Color;
012
013/**
014 * {@link ColorEnumeration} defining a set of selected AWT colors.
015 * 
016 * @author WB
017 *
018 */
019public enum BasicAwtColor implements ColorEnumeration {
020        Black(Color.black),
021        Blue(Color.blue),
022        Cyan(Color.cyan),
023        DarkGray(Color.darkGray),
024        Gray(Color.gray),
025        Green(Color.green),
026        LightGray(Color.lightGray),
027        Magenta(Color.magenta),
028        Orange(Color.orange),
029        Pink(Color.pink),
030        Red(Color.red),
031        White(Color.white),
032        Yellow(Color.yellow);
033        
034        private final Color color;
035        
036        BasicAwtColor(int r, int g, int b) {
037                this(new Color(r, g, b));
038        }
039        
040        BasicAwtColor(Color col) {
041                this.color = col;
042        }
043        
044        @Override
045        public Color getColor() {
046                return this.color;
047        }
048        
049}
